attributes.action: Make It Easier to Challenge Psychiatric Practice and Opinion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These days challenging psychiatric practice and opinion is very difficult.  Even specialist solicitors don't know how to do this.  And "vulnerable" and unassertive patients don't stand a chance.  So much of psychiatry takes place behind closed doors with an institutionalised mentality.  And matters labelled as "clinical" are automatically seen as beyond challenge because non-psychiatric staff do not feel qualified to make a challenge.  Complaint departments should have the power to insist that questions are answered and changes are made in order to serve customers much better.
